Posts.Content: May 20, 2013 01:12AM intrepidspirit wrote: Pink sisters-  I finished chemo last June.  A few months later, I began to experience pain in the first 3 fingernails on my left hand.  This pain is actually underneath my fingernail bed, and it's excruciating!  And weirdly, the pain comes on in early evening, worsens to the point where I want to bite my own fingers off, but the next morning, the pain is gone.  My onco keeps telling me this will subside, but it's almost been a year and I am going crazy.  I did have Taxotere during chemo.  My fingernails are not black.  I was diagnosed with thyroid cancer last week, and am having it removed next week.  I want to feel good again and this nail pain is just b.s.!!  can anyone out there give me some advice, or point me in the right direction as to who might know what to do about this symptom? Always remember, you are stronger than you ever imagined......
Posts.Title: Black Fingernails. suzette5956 lago
